page.title: 13The Shop. Middleton.
page.content: North Runcton has no shops but Middleton has a general stores and a small Post Office. The general stores are beside the main road but the main business is with local people.It is open every weekday between 8.30 and 5.30 and on Sundays between 10.00 and 2.00. Best selling items are bread, milk, butter, sweets, cigarettes, and beer. The owners buy all their stock at the {Cash and Carry.}As well as selling in the shop they deliver groceries to elderly people in the village. The shop plays an important part in the life of the village. People can advertise things for sale or wanted there and much local news is exchanged there. The{Post 0ffice}is run by one lady and is open for five and a half days each week.
